price: They[101] will receive their share of what they have earned. And Allah is swift in reckoning.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّمَّا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
footnotes: [101] Those who supplicate with this prayer.
